short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute select profiles and companies on linkedin without unfollowing them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to mute somebody on LinkedIn without having to unfollow them? Especially when LinkedIn sends notifications when you follow them again. Besides them being able to find out you actually unfollowed them.

The purpose of this extension is to let you mute connections or followed entities without using the unfollow button.

This will work on the following entities:
- LinkedIn followed profiles
- LinkedIn followed companies
- LinkedIn connections

To use the extension, simply install it, visit a LinkedIn activity/feed page, and click the extension icon to add URNs to blacklist, and save changes. Upon future visits, these profiles and companies will be hidden from your activity feeds.
